items.title: Seiko Prospex Man SPB151J1
items.desc: It’s time to take your accessorising game to the next level. Like jewellery for your watch, our innovative case cuffs can be clipped on for extra impact or easily removed on days when you’re feeling a less is more vibe. This pretty style combines a clean white dial and a soft grey lilac leather strap.

reviews.name: Reza Pahlevi
reviews.comment: Overall good, comfortable to wear. The strap feels premium for everyday wear. Very stylist and modern model. Very satisfied. But unfortunately the colors are limited. But okay.

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.comment: The functionality is good, but the style and colors are not very good. No problem still worth to buy.
